mapper.select: select USERNAME, PASSWORD, SEX, CARDTYPE, CARDNO, CNNAME, DEPT, ADDRESS, MOBILEID, POSTCODE, REGTIME, EFFTIME, LOSETIME, STATE, IMG from t_user where USERNAME = #{username}
select USERNAME, PASSWORD, SEX, CARDTYPE, CARDNO, CNNAME, DEPT, ADDRESS, MOBILEID, POSTCODE, REGTIME, EFFTIME, LOSETIME, STATE from t_user where USERNAME = #{username} and PASSWORD = #{password}
